name: Thinking About Sudoku
description:
Are you thinking about sudoku? Like a lot? Like enough that you should see a doctor? If so, then Thinking About Sudoku is the game for you! Dozens of puzzles, with dozens more to come, are yours to play for FREE! (spoiler alert: there are a few unobtrusive ads in the game)

Thinking About Sudoku has four levels of difficulty: simple, easy, intermediate and hard. But it only has one level of fun: lots. :)

Thinking About Sudoku is easy to play with intuitive controls, elegant fonts, and soothing colors. If you like sudoku, this game is for you.

If you are are font-nerd, this game is for you. If color gradients are your thing, this game is for you. If you like graphic design and flat-interface, this game is for you, too.

Stay tuned for lots of updates & improvements and thank you for trying Thinking About Sudoku. Enjoy!

The Thinking About Games team!
